RewardStream

I worked as a Junior Developer at RewardStream, a referral marketing SaaS company, and had the opportunity to design and implement features on a team of developers in an agile development environment. I researched, designed and implemented a client onboarding tool using AngularJS and Bootstrap. I updated Shopify, Magento and WooCommerce extensions to support new features alongside our Java RESTful API, and implemented an analytics dashboard(Periscope) with SQL queries. I updated existing client management portal PHP code to a SPA using AngularJS. I identified, triaged and fixed bugs on the backend, user-facing and client-facing product.

AngularJS Bootstrap RESTful API PostgreSQL Periscope Handlebars.js PHP JIRA CSS

Syncline

Link Code

A tool aimed at geotechnical engineers to streamline the process of collecting, reviewing and approving site investigation information. This is an early proof of concept developed as a final project at Lighthouse Labs. This was a team project developed over the course of two weeks. This project taught me about designing a database schema, writing detailed user stories, creating a secure app with Ruby on Rails, JavaScript animations, git branching in a team environment, and using external APIs.

Ruby on Rails Javascript JQuery PostgreSQL Mapbox Handlebars.js HTML Canvas CSS HTML
